segments.text: I notice the boy is climbing on a stool to reach the cookie jar.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The stool looks so unstable, like it could tip over any second.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He's stretching his body upward, trying to grab as many cookies as he can.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I see his hand reaching into the jar, and he's holding a plate with the other.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl is standing nearby, looking up at him with her hand open.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She seems to be waiting for him to give her a cookie.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I think they're both being very sneaky, trying to get cookies without permission.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman drying dishes has no idea what's going on behind her.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder if the boy will fall off that stool.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The counter below the cabinet is clear, giving him space to climb.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope they don't make a mess or get hurt.
segments.speaker: PAR
